GSD.description:
arm64: cacheinfo: Fix incorrect assignment of signed error value to unsigned fw_level

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.19.7 by commit a754ee1c66bd0a23e613f0bf865053b29cb90e16. For more details please see the references link.
